## Growth

```{python}
sept_7 = 4366
aug_7 = 1830
growth_per_month = (sept_7 / aug_7) - 1
growth_per_month
```

```{python}
sept_7 * (1 + growth_per_month)
```

```{python}
aug_22 = 2830
aug_22
```

```{python}
(sept_7 / aug_22) ** (1/(15/30)) - 1
```
